Kruger National Park Weather in September: Mild Days, Cool Nights

As winter transitions to spring in the Kruger National Park, September brings a welcome change in weather. The days are mild, the nights are cool, and the wildlife is still active. This month is ideal for game viewing as animals are more visible against the dry landscape.

“The only thing predictable about Africa is its unpredictability.”
